oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Shadowbox of various relics found near Chattanooga
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Shadowbox of various relics recovered from a former Union cavalry camp at Wauhatchie, Tennessee. Includes a variety of Sharps carbine rounds, .44-caliber pistol bullets, a few Spencer rounds, a D ring from a McClellan saddle, and a portion of a spur.
oai_dc:dc.dc:format: Tools and equipment; Weapons and ammunition
